articles.title: 80-year-old woman who ran Mumbai Marathon in saree is an inspiration for people - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The TATA marathon which was held on Sunday saw a massive turnout. Among the competitors, was an 80-year-old woman who ran four kilometers and became an inspiration for many. | Trending
articles.content: There was a record-breaking turnout for the 18th edition of the renowned Tata Mumbai Marathon, which took place on Sunday. Mumbai residents from all backgrounds ran together for various social causes… [+1158 chars]
